verses.verse: (1 Cor. 14:29; 1 John 4:1) Test all things; (Phil. 4:8) hold fast what is good.
Abstain from every form of evil.

Blessing and Admonition Now may (Phil. 4:9) the God of peace Himself (1 Thess. 3:13) sanctify you completely; and may your whole spirit, soul, and body (1 Cor. 1:8, 9) be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
He who calls you is ((1 Cor. 10:13); 2 Thess. 3:3) faithful, who also will (Phil. 1:6) do it.
Greet all the brethren with a holy kiss.
I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read to all the holy brethren.
The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
Greeting Paul, Silvanus, and Timothy, To the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ:
(1 Cor. 1:3) Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
